posts.post_content:
NEED A LTTILE PP FOR ANOTHER ITEM.
REDUCED TO $35 DLVD.

I collect backs (mostly) and keep them in binders. I have upgraded my Sweet Caporal 350/460 Factory 25, so this Vic Willis card is available. 

The SC 350/460 Fac 25 is ranked 19 (out of 38) and is more scarce than Cycle 350, Tolstoi or EPDG backs.

It was a SGC 20 before I set it free.

$35 includes shipping between cardboard, in bubble envelope with tracking.
PP FF.

PM any questions or comments. 

Thanks.

-Jimmy
